property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One pounce, she's hungry - you die quickly. Two, she's teaching her cubs - you're in for a long day.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We decide who is worthy of our works." - Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." - Naimah, Femeref philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Uktabi Orangutan enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it true that the apes wear furs of gold when they marry?" - Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is vain to look for a defense against lightning." - Publius Syrus, Maxim 835, trans. Lyman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The imps' warbling cries echo through Phyrexia's towers like those of mourning doves in a cathedral.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Red spells cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Dauthi Slayer attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A wisp of life remains in the undergloom of Death: a visible form, though no heart beats within it." - Homer, *The Iliad*, trans. Fitzgerald

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If a man will begin with certainties, he shall end in doubts." - Sir Francis Bacon, *The Advancement of Learning*

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time flows like a river. In Tolaria we practice the art of building dams." - Barrin, master wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not teach. I simply reveal." - Daudi, Femeref tutor

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Skirk Marauder is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Mountain {2}: Enchanted Mountain becomes a 6/1 red Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Spires from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have no need for military might. We wield two of the sharpest swords ever forged: Faith in our left hand, Wealth in our right." - Vuliev of the Ghost Council

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness. - Suq'Ata saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Okina Nightwatch gets +3/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the most skilled budoka could protect the Okina Shrine. Only the best of these protectors took the night watch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blazekite is a simple concept, really - just a vehicular application of dragscoop ionics and electropropulsion magnetronics." - Juzba, Izzet tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Karn, Silver Golem blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -4/+4 until end of turn. {1}: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire." - "Hymn of Angelfire"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Glacial Ray deals 2 damage to any target. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Circle of Protection: Art enters the battlefield, choose an artist. {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. {1}{W}: Return Circle of Protection: Art to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast spells with the same name as this spell from among those cards without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Surging Flame deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greven *il*-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Statistically mind-staggering as it might seem, the term "mise" was in fact coined simultaneously by over one thousand Magic players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Make your judgment wisely: The right pack will let you defeat your nemesis, but a poor choice can only end in torment. And *Homelands*.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Draw a card. When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you speak, sacrifice Goblin Mime.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mung noticed a few clouds gathering in the sky. Perhaps today he could perform his "walking against the wind" routine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain life equal to your age.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few remember the exploits of Dakkon's grandmother, Eunice Blackblade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Coupon: Target player gets you target drink. You pay any costs for the drink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Limited time offer. Void where prohibited. Limit one per purchase. Valid only in participating duels. This coupon is nontransferable and invalid if shattered, crumbled, detonated, pillaged, or otherwise disenchanted. Cash value less than 1/20 of a cent. Offer not valid in Quebec, Rhode Island, or where prohibited by law or the DCI.
